title: Trender Loving Care 7/7: Bolsonaro, Joe Shapiro, Ringo Starr, Student Ban
itunes:title: Trender Loving Care 7/7: Bolsonaro, Joe Shapiro, Ringo Starr, Student Ban
description:
On this edition of Trender Loving Care Jack and Miles (!) discuss Jair Bolsonaro testing positive for COVID-19, Mary Trump's new book suggests someone took Trump's tests for him in school, it's Ringo's 80th birthday, and ICE is using international student's inability to attend physical classes to force their deportation or force their transfer to a school that allows in-person classes.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
